hiveArticle.title: B&W Photo Contest - Macro - Entry #2 - Flower
hiveArticle.body:
This is my second entry for the B&W photo contest initiated by @daveks.

### Flower

My first entry was also a flower. It is just so nice to take photos of flowers, and also the macro ones. You can see so much inside a flower.

<hr>

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/18pcc2vgvk.jpg)

<hr>

Camera : Nokia 6, Edited to Black and White

 <hr>
